listing.CommentsLong:
Privacy, Exclusivity, and one of a kind Legacy

Mansion 201 at the Plaza Residences is the only home in the storied building to boast private elevator access and a personal grand staircase. This trophy 4,665 square foot home is in triple mint condition with 3 bedrooms plus staff room and 4 bathrooms. The home also features Central Park views from every window and antique limed French oak herringbone and wide plank flooring.

Whether you're a seasoned chef or just love to entertain, The Mansion boasts a refined, custom eat-in kitchen with plenty of room to prep for a party. The kitchen features Nero Marquita stone countertops, gorgeous custom cabinetry, and a Mosaic Calacatta marble backsplash. Every feature in the home has been carefully designed including impeccable period moldings and fine woodwork all crafted and installed by the world renowned Clive Christian. The residence also comes equipped with Castlewood soundproof windows and Quiet Rock insulation making the residence exceedingly quiet.

All the residence's high-end furnishings, including furniture by Armani/Casa, Poltrona Frau, and Clive Christian, Bang & Olufsen audio-visual equipment and gorgeous artwork, rugs and draperies are part of the purchase, making this a true turn-key pied-a-terre or home. In addition to the vast range of white-glove services the building offers such as in-room dining, maid service, concierge, and 24-hour doorman, Condo owners have full access to The Plaza Hotel's vast amenities: Warren Tricomi Salon, Palestra Fitness Center, The Plaza Food Hall by Todd English, Palm Court Restaurant, Rose Bar and The Champagne Bar. Pets and pied-a-terre's are welcome.

Living room and master bedroom photos are virtually staged.

Bountiful Elegance. Located on the most desirable block in Greenwich Village, this extraordinary single family home offers everything one dreams of in a Village house. Celebrated West Village Block, exquisite scale, flawless condition, suffused with light, three south facing terraces and tamed landscaped gardens both north and south. This is a singular and exceptional offering.

Bathed in sunlight this gloriously sunny home was designed by noted architect Basil Walter and is an enchanting mix of grand and practical; open plan and intimate; English and American; distinguished and whimsical. Very rare is the intelligence and warmth that has gone into its creation.

As you enter thru the front garden and up the stoop you are welcomed into a fabulous grand open parlor with wood burning fireplace and floor to ceiling windows and doors that open onto the south facing terrace overlooking the garden. On this floor there is also formal entry hall, closets, a powder room and a stunning sitting room lined with seventeenth-century wood paneling and floor to ceiling windows overlooking the tree-lined street. An extraordinary feature of the house is the fabulous sweeping elliptical stair that bathes the house in light from above and creates a graceful flow throughout.

The garden level offers a family room overlooking the front garden, an inviting dining room and delightful family chef's kitchen with a wall of glass doors opening onto the verdant south facing garden.

On the upper floors there is a divine and peaceful master suite with a wood burning fireplace and a wonderful south terrace, 3 marvelous bedrooms and 2 additional baths.

Perched on top is an incredible glass and steel atelier addition. This inspirational studio/ office / library, was inspired by Maison de Verre in Paris. The south wall cantilevers open with the touch of an extraordinary hand crank (easily manipulated) giving on to a third south facing terrace. In addition there is a dramatic steel stair that leads to the very top with unmatched views of the landmarked West Village.

This home has been painstakingly built by artisans and great care has been taken to every details of the house. The history and integrity of this house remain, enhanced by the addition of state of the art modern day amenities and superb condition. This Marvelous home was featured in "House and Garden" in 2015.

http://www.houseandgarden.co.uk/interiors/real-homes/town-house-manhattans-west-village

Privacy, Exclusivity, and one of a kind Legacy

Mansion 201 at the Plaza Residences is the only home in the storied building to boast private elevator access and a personal grand staircase. This trophy 4,665 square foot home is in triple mint condition with 3 bedrooms plus staff room and 4 bathrooms. The home also features Central Park views from every window and antique limed French oak herringbone and wide plank flooring.

Whether you're a seasoned chef or just love to entertain, The Mansion boasts a refined, custom eat-in kitchen with plenty of room to prep for a party. The kitchen features Nero Marquita stone countertops, gorgeous custom cabinetry, and a Mosaic Calacatta marble backsplash. Every feature in the home has been carefully designed including impeccable period moldings and fine woodwork all crafted and installed by the world renowned Clive Christian. The residence also comes equipped with Castlewood soundproof windows and Quiet Rock insulation making the residence exceedingly quiet.

All the residence's high-end furnishings, including furniture by Armani/Casa, Poltrona Frau, and Clive Christian, Bang & Olufsen audio-visual equipment and gorgeous artwork, rugs and draperies are part of the purchase, making this a true turn-key pied-a-terre or home. In addition to the vast range of white-glove services the building offers such as in-room dining, maid service, concierge, and 24-hour doorman, Condo owners have full access to The Plaza Hotel's vast amenities: Warren Tricomi Salon, Palestra Fitness Center, The Plaza Food Hall by Todd English, Palm Court Restaurant, Rose Bar and The Champagne Bar. Pets and pied-a-terre's are welcome.

Living room and master bedroom photos are virtually staged.

147 E. 63rd Street is a five-story gated limestone townhouse that has recently gone through a luxurious cosmetic, mechanical, and structural renovation. The house features a 30-foot garden, two terraces, an elevator that serves all five floors, and a state-of-the-art Crestron system.

The ground floor features an elegant entry hallway and foyer, a den with custom built-ins, and a large eat-in kitchen that opens up to the landscaped garden. The stunning parlor floor ceilings soar beyond 11 feet high, where a new entertaining wet bar connects the formal dining room or library to the spacious living room with a wood-burning fireplace.

The newly renovated master suite awaits you on the third floor. A glamorous Poliform walk-in closet connects the bedroom to the grand master bathroom which includes a wood burning fire place, Kohler appliances, Dornbracht hardware, Calacatta marble, and gradient glass. The fourth floor houses two bedrooms, two bathrooms, plenty of closet space, and laundry. Topping the building on the fifth floor are two more bedrooms  one with its own terrace. The basement features an additional laundry room, powder room, mechanicals, and several storage areas.

147 E. 63rd Street is conveniently located in close proximity to Equinox, Soul Cycle, the subway and some of best restaurants in Manhattan. Living in this pristine townhouse is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity.

Can be purchased fully furnished.

Experience stunning Manhattan views from every room of this gorgeous penthouse condominium, located on one of NYCs most coveted blocks. This bright, two-bedroom home greets guests with a beautiful foyer that leads into spacious, luxurious living and dining rooms. The two oversized bedrooms offer the ultimate in comfort and privacy with their numerous closets, en-suite bathrooms, split layout and grand city views.

The two and a half bathrooms are comprised of dazzling marble, while the renovated kitchen offers everything a chef could need. This is a truly exclusive NYC building, the apartment is one of only two on the floor, in a full-service doorman building.
45 West 67th Street is just steps away from some of NYCs greatest landmarks including Central Park and Lincoln Center. This is a pet-friendly building.
Across the street, with its sweeping views of the New York City skyline, a 5000sf Equinox palatial club boasts a recent multi-million dollar investment to elevate it into one of New Yorks most eminent fitness havens.

Take advantage of this rare opportunity to own a home in one of the very few condominiums in the most coveted neighborhood in New York City. This luxury apartment is located in The Century, a classic and sophisticated building that was given landmark status in 1985.

You can access the apartment through either a private ground-level entrance that leads you to a welcoming foyer and stairway to the spacious home or by taking the elevator to the second floor.
Once you have entered this spacious apartment filled with character, you will find a practical prewar classic six layout that features beautiful views of Central Park from both the living room and master bedroom.
The living room's prewar charm is enhanced by a decorative fireplace.
Storage is abundantly available throughout the apartment.

While the sunken living room faces Central Park, the official dining area (convertible 3rd bedroom) and the second bedroom face the building's serene and quiet courtyard that is kept meticulously manicured. The updated kitchen shows high-end appliances and beautiful marble floors.
The maid's room was converted to a spacious laundry room with a brand new GE washer and separate GE dryer. Freshly painted and featuring elegantly refurbished wooden floors, this apartment presents a warm and serene atmosphere.

The apartment comes with separate storage in the basement.
Ongoing assessment of $261.97/month

The Century is a full-service, pet-friendly building with a concierge, landscaped terrace, and parking options. It is located right near some of the most iconic NYC cultural landmarks including Lincoln Center, Columbus Circle and Time Warner Center, as well as great shops and restaurants.

Experience spectacular city views in this Upper East Side Trump Palace condominium - the best value three bedroom in the entire building. This 3 bedroom, 3.5 bathroom home features Manhattan skyline views to the South, East, and West through the oversized windows or from the two large terraces. There are endless options for this great space, which has a den/dining room that is currently being used as a maids room. One of the bathrooms has been enlarged and meticulously renovated and there is a washer and dryer in the unit. The apartment is full of storage space with two large walk-in closets. There is a separate very large deeded storage unit included in the sale. This gorgeous condo is located in a full-service building with a full-time doorman, fitness center, on-site attended garage, childrens play area, landscaped courtyard garden and a roof deck.

Enjoy captivating East River views from this triple-mint duplex on the top floors of a beautifully maintained condo.

Situated on the top two floors of an impeccably maintained condo, this 5-Bedroom, 4-Bathroom duplex redefines Manhattan luxury with its custom finishes. Meanwhile, oversized windows capture North, East, and West exposures, framing fantastic views of East River.

The chefs kitchen showcases bespoke design by boutique firm St. Charles of New York, complete with top-of-the-line, stainless steel appliances by Kohler, plus a vented range and mosaic backsplashes. Similarly, bathrooms evoke modern elegance and feature luxurious details, from spa-inspired glass showers surrounded by mosaic tiling, to soaking tubs and custom vanities.

Calcutta marble floors lend a distinctive touch to the dining and living rooms, whereas Brazilian hardwood floors add a rich depth throughout the duplexs other spaces. These exquisite materials are further complemented by detail molding and custom closets. Meanwhile, an in-unit washer/dryer and soundproof doors add excellent conveniences.

Found on a quiet block by the East River, 402 East 90th Street is staffed by a full-time doorman.

Spacious 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom corner loft is now available in the desirable Downtown by Philippe Starck condo. Over 2,200 square feet of luxury living makes this home a rare gem in the middle of Manhattan's fastest growing neighborhood: The Financial District.

The sunlit living room features hardwood maple floors, 11.5 foot ceilings, and a wall of oversized windows overlooking the historic NY Stock Exchange.

Enjoy your chefs kitchen with top-of-the-line appliances made by Bosch and Viking. The backsplash and countertops are beautifully done with white quartz; and the cabinetry is custom with ample storage.

The home features two master bedrooms with en-suite marble bathrooms and amazing closet space throughout!

Enjoy the lavish lifestyle of Downtown by Starck with the best white glove amenities in NYC: the building features a beautifully finished business center, bowling alley, theater, sports lounge, recreation room, children's playroom, and a fitness center complete with a yoga/ballet studio, swimming pool, and basketball court. Take advantage of the 5,000 square foot rooftop park with its very own reflecting pool and lounge area.

Experience the best NYC has to offer - stunning, rare outdoor space that most New Yorkers can only dream of, right in Chelsea. This bright, 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom home comes with a 440 square foot private terrace that allows you to transport yourself away from the crowded city streets and feel as though you are in a lovely country garden.
Inside this sun-drenched home, you'll find floor to ceiling windows, high ceilings, and limestone bathrooms with a newly-installed steam shower in the master. The airy open kitchen features a built-in GE Monogram refrigerator, a Fisher & Paykel range, oven, and double-drawer dishwashers, Pietra Cardosa stone countertops and Macassar Ebony wood cabinetry.

The Chelsea Stratus is a coveted, full-service building with a high-tech fitness center, entertainment lounge with large TV, basketball court, copper fireplace, dining area with a catering kitchen, billiards room, outdoor landscaped garden and the best roof deck you will find downtown featuring a dog run and BBQ Grills. The building is just steps from the PATH, F and M trains located near some of the best dining and shopping in Manhattan.

This unit can be sold with or without tenant in place.*
Storage unit transfers with purchase.
